articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Amazing close-up of Venus captured by NASA Parker Solar Probe
articles.description: While on a journey to study the sun, NASA's Parker Solar Probe has captured an incredible new view of Venus that appears to look down through the planet's thick clouds to the surface.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: What Mitt Romney gets *exactly* right about Donald Trump
articles.description: Mitt Romney is no fan of Donald Trump. In fact, the Utah Republican senator may be the single most prominent critic of the 45th President within the GOP.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: 'This is not a career enhancer': Tapper asks Cabinet secretary why he took job
articles.description: In his first interview since being confirmed as President Joe Biden's secretary of veterans affairs, Denis McDonough tells CNN's Jake Tapper why he accepted the challenging position.

articles.author: Priscilla Alvarez, CNN
articles.title: Lawyers make progress in locating parents of children split from families at the border, latest court filing says
articles.description: Lawyers are still trying to locate the parents of 506 children who had been split from their families at the US-Mexico border by the Trump administration, according to a new court filing -- down from a month ago when attorneys were looking for the parents of …

articles.author: Whitney Wild and Jeremy Herb, CNN
articles.title: Acting US Capitol Police chief says intelligence failed to predict scope of January 6 attack

articles.author: Dianne Gallagher, Kelly Mena and Wesley Bruer, CNN
articles.title: AZ lawmakers weigh bill that would allow legislature to review election results 'if needed'
articles.description: Arizona lawmakers are debating a new set of voting bills -- including one that would allow lawmakers to review election results "if needed" and would grant the legislature the power to pick the state's presidential electors -- as Republican lawmakers around t…

articles.title: Experts: Former CIA agent victim of microwave weapon in Moscow
articles.description: CNN's Kylie Atwood reports on a former CIA officer's claims about an invisible attack in a Moscow hotel, one experts now claim was likely a microwave weapon.

articles.author: Kristen Holmes
articles.title: Biden to nominate 3 to USPS Board of Governors
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Wednesday announced three nominees to fill most of the vacancies on the US Postal Service Board of Governors, fulfilling a promise that the administration would make the board and the agency a priority in the early days of his presidenc…

articles.author: Matias Grez, CNN
articles.title: Real Madrid breaks Atalanta hearts with late goal after controversial red card
articles.description: In a match that was largely low on quality, it was a standout moment of brilliance that eventually gave Real Madrid a narrow 1-0 win over 10-man Atalanta in the Champions League round of 16.

articles.author: Frank Pallotta, CNN Business
articles.title: Paramount+: Here's everything you need to know about ViacomCBS' new streaming service
articles.description: ViacomCBS has been heavily advertising Paramount+, its new streaming service, with an ad campaign that has some of its biggest stars — everyone from James Corden to Beavis and Butt-Head — on an expedition to scale Paramount Mountain.

articles.author: Andrew Kaczynski and Em Steck, CNN
articles.title: Close ally of Marjorie Taylor Greene among those in Capitol mob
articles.description: A close ally of Georgia Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene took part in the January 6 mob at the Capitol and said he was among those who eventually made their way into the building.

articles.author: Devan Cole, CNN
articles.title: DC mayor's sister dies from Covid-19
articles.description: Washington Mayor Muriel Bowser's sister died Wednesday at age 64 from "complications related to Covid-19," the mayor said in a statement.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)Washington Mayor Muriel Bowser's sister died Wednesday at age 64 from "complications related to Covid-19," the mayor said in a statement.

articles.author: Oren Liebermann, CNN
articles.title: Pentagon chief urges service members to get vaccinated after it was revealed one-third are opting out
articles.description: Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin urged military service members to get vaccinated against the coronavirus in a video statement released Wednesday after it was revealed last week that approximately one-third have opted out of receiving doses.

articles.title: Owner plunges into frozen pool to save dog
articles.description: A dog owner in Tennessee wasted no time jumping into a frozen pool to save her dog, Sid, who was stuck under a sheet of ice.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Astronauts will conduct a spacewalk this Sunday
articles.description: If you're fond of waking up early and getting the awe-inspiring perspective of an astronaut floating in space, put Sunday's spacewalk on your calendar.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: US sprinter Grant Holloway breaks the world record for the indoor 60m hurdles in Madrid
articles.description: US track and field athlete Grant Holloway just broke the world record for the indoor 60-meter hurdles.

articles.author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: House Democrats reintroduce police reform bill named in honor of George Floyd
articles.description: House Democrats on Wednesday reintroduced policing legislation named in honor of George Floyd, whose death in police custody last year sparked nationwide calls to address police misconduct and racial injustice.

articles.title: CIA launches task force to probe invisible attacks on US diplomats and spies as one victim finds some relief
articles.description: More than three years after former senior US intelligence officer Marc Polymeropoulos suffered a mysterious attack in Moscow that changed his life forever, he finally has a diagnosis: a traumatic brain injury, sleep insomnia, and anxiety.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: New Mars image from rover landing site shows the red planet in high definition
articles.description: The Perseverance rover's Mastcam-Z instrument has shared the first high-definition look at its landing site in Jezero Crater in the form of a 360-degree panorama, stitched together from 142 images.
